sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Major Andres Vali, Ukrainian Army Commander Based on the lessons of the Ukrainian war, we used more small unit tactics and we exercised dispersed combat operations on terrain with the emphasis on the usage of anti-tank systems so that there wouldn't be only the anti-tank units, but also infantry personnel who would be able to use the anti-tank weapon system.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
